General.Name: Wuhan DR Laser Technology Corp Ltd
General.Description: Wuhan DR Laser Technology Corp.,Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of laser equipment for solar cell applications in China and internationally. It provides laser ablation, laser doping, laser drilling, laser scribing, and laser repairing systems, as well as other products. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zhibo  Liu
1.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
